|brand = CradlePoint |model = IBR600E |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (Verizon) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, 3G mobile router, |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UXX-IBR600E, N7N-MC5728, |icid = 2417C-MC5728 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3352; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 400 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6JB25I; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:30:44 |oui = 00:30:44
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe (USB only) |exp_minipcie_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = 3G (CDMA) |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = IBR600-XXX |defaultssid_regex = ^IBR600-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = U-MEDIA |manuf_model = MPB-377L |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/10/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 661799365543 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0074LVTNK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC5728V |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (USB only) |rad2chip1cpu = <!-- true, --> |rad2chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = <!-- Number of transmit radio chains, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad2rxchains = <!-- Number of receive radio chains, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad2sstreams = <!-- Number of spatial data streams, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad2stand = CDMA |rad2ay = <!-- Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad2ax = <!-- 1148, 1150, 4800, 4804, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad2ad = <!-- ??? Maximum throughput rated at --> |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = <!-- 433, 565, 600, 867, 900, 1300, 1733, Maximum throughput rated at --> |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = <!-- 150, 300, 450, 600, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad2g = <!-- 54, 108, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad2b = <!-- 11, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad2a = <!-- 54, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad2freq = <!-- 2.4 or 5, Frequency band(s) of this radio --> |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Per the manual, the default SSID pattern is '''IBR600-XXX'''. WiGLE data indicates that the SSID is the last three hex digits of the wireless interface MAC (lower case letters). The default password appears to be the last 8 digits of the wireless interface MAC address.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.cradlepoint.com/sites/default/files/productdocs/CradlePoint_COR_IBR6x0_DataSheet_6.14.12.pdf Datasheet] {{â€¢}} [http://www.cradlepoint.com/sites/default/files/productdocs/COR_IBR6x0_manual_3.6.1.pdf Manual]
